T1: Start the Scan by Pressing the Search Icon from the Bottom Bar.
T2: Choose the Cars Devices, then Press the Save Icon from the Bottom Bar.
T3: Enable Your Devices Location Service First
T4: Use systems theme, this will only work as intended on android 12+
T5: Key received from QR code, This will replace your current key, Are you sure you want to continue?
B1: An Application that Provides You With Access to Advanced Driver Assistance Systems that Helps You Drive Better and Safer
B2: A System that provides optimal security for your car with the ability to calculate the distance between you and your car
B3: A System to show your cars movements and speed in real time, With the ability to control it
